entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 6:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: E 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this morning. Risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
